title: NA Speaker, Deputy Speaker commiserate with Patel over brother’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 27 (APP):National Assembly Speaker Raja Pervaiz Ashraf and Deputy Speaker Zahid Akram Durrani on Friday commiserated with Minister for National Health Services, Regulations & Coordination, Abdul Qadir Patel over the demise of his brother.
In separate condolence messages to Abdul Qadir Patel, speaker and deputy speaker expressed their deep sorrow and regret over the sad demise.
They both prayed for the deceased’s eternal peace and grant of courage to the grieved family members.
